message.entry: Inputs must be single or double.
First and second inputs must be square.
First and second inputs must not contain NaN or Inf.
Inputs must be single, double, or ''I'' to specify an identity matrix.
Substituting ''I'' for a matrix is only supported in the combinations SYLVESTER_TRI(A, B, C, ''I'', ''I'') and SYLVESTER_TRI(A, ''I'', C, ''I'', F).
